entities.name: Great Atlantis
entities.definition: Ancient civilization with mighty wisdom, ten island kingdoms ruled by advanced beings

evidence.quote: Great were my people in the ancient days, great beyond the conception of the little people now around me; knowing the wisdom of old

entities.name: City of Keor on Island of Undal
entities.definition: Great city where Thoth incarnated, located on surviving island after Atlantis sinking

evidence.quote: In the great city of Keor on the island of Undal in a time far past, I began this incarnation

entities.name: Halls of Amenti
entities.definition: Underworld realm beneath sunken Atlantis where souls renew life and masters dwell eternally

evidence.quote: Deep in the Earth's heart lie the Halls of Amenti, far 'neath the islands of sunken Atlantis, Halls of the Dead and halls of the living

entities.name: Children of Light
entities.definition: Thirty-two advanced beings who descended from space-time to free humanity from bondage

evidence.quote: Thirty and two were there of the children, sons of Light who had come among men, seeking to free from the bondage of darkness

entities.name: Seven Lords of Amenti
entities.definition: Numerical cosmic masters (Three through Nine) governing different aspects of reality and human development

evidence.quote: Seven are they, the Lords of Amenti, overlords they of the Children of Morning, Suns of the Cycles, Masters of Wisdom

entities.name: The Dweller
entities.definition: Formless master from beyond cycles who ruled through three messengers and controlled Atlantis destruction

evidence.quote: Master, He, from a cycle beyond us, living in bodies as one among men. Not as the earth-born, He from beyond us

entities.name: Children of Shadows/Serpent-Headed Beings
entities.definition: Formless entities from deep spaces who infiltrated Atlantis through blood sacrifice and dark magic

evidence.quote: Serpent-headed when the glamour was lifted but appearing to man as men among men. Crept they into the Councils

entities.name: Magic-Science
entities.definition: Atlantean fusion of mystical and technological knowledge enabling matter manipulation and energy projection

evidence.quote: Cowed I them by my display of magic-science... using the power that overcomes Earth force (gravity)

entities.name: Ether Manipulation
entities.definition: Advanced ability to condense, coalesce and shape primordial ether into physical forms through will

evidence.quote: condensing, coalescing the ether into forms that grew as they willed... formed in their mind only a picture and swiftly created

entities.name: Flower of Life/Light
entities.definition: Central energy source in Halls of Amenti providing life-giving and light-giving power to masters

evidence.quote: Deep in the Halls of Life grew a flower, flaming, expanding, driving backward the night... Life giving, Light giving

morphisms.statement: Dweller controlled Atlantis destruction when it turned to darkness and opened forbidden gateways

evidence.quote: Called He then on the powers of the Seven Lords wielded; changed the Earth's balance. Down sank Atlantis beneath the dark waves

morphisms.statement: Shadow beings infiltrated Atlantean councils through blood offerings and ruled by deception

evidence.quote: Lived they in Atlantis as shadows... Crept they into the Councils, taking forms that were like unto men

morphisms.statement: Children of Light created and dwell eternally in Halls of Amenti beneath sunken Atlantis

evidence.quote: Builded they then the Halls of Amenti, that they might dwell eternally there living with life to eternity's end

morphisms.statement: Each numbered lord governs different aspects of cosmic law and mystical knowledge

evidence.quote: Three holds the key of all hidden magic... Five is the master, the Lord of all magic—Key to The Word

morphisms.statement: Flower provides life-force enabling advanced matter manipulation and consciousness expansion

evidence.quote: Placed in the center, a ray of great potence, Life giving, Light giving, filling with power all who came near it

olog.name: Atlantean Esoteric Cosmology
axioms: Advanced beings from space-time descended to guide human evolution
Atlantis possessed magic-science blending mystical and technological knowledge
Numerical cosmic lords govern reality through vibrational law
Serpent entities from lower dimensions infiltrated human civilization
Ether manipulation enables matter creation through conscious will
rules: IF civilizations turn to darkness THEN cosmic dwellers destroy them
IF beings offer blood sacrifice THEN shadow entities gain physical form
IF souls achieve light mastery THEN they access eternal halls
IF consciousness attunes to ether THEN matter responds to mental commands

evidence.quote: Not as the little men of the present age did the mighty ones of Atlantis live and die, but rather from aeon to aeon did they renew their life
Only through blood could they have formed being. Only through man could they live in the world
formed in their mind only a picture and swiftly created, it grew
